headline.main: TALK OF A CHRISTIAN MAN; Henry Ward Beecher in Reply to Some of his Critics.

docs.lead_paragraph: From ?? Independent. Last week we made a partial confession our Faith. This week we make a partial confession of our Practice. And we now print the entire first part of the article from the New-York Examiner, the last part of which it was more convenient to dispose of first:

docs.snippet: [To SENATORS: It is respectfully suggested to Senators that their voices are inaudible in the gallery when pitched in the same key they were wont to use in the old Chamber. This is especially the case during the morning hour, when, their voices...

headline.main: XXXVth Congress---Second Session.; SENATE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES.

docs.lead_paragraph: [To SENATORS: It is respectfully suggested to Senators that their voices are inaudible in the gallery when pitched in the same key they were wont to use in the old Chamber. This is especially the case during the morning hour, when, their voices failing to reach the terzo cercinc--the exalted circle assigned to the Press,--the business seems to be transacted in dumb show, and the proceedings have the appearance of a not very expressive pantomime.--REPORTER.]

docs.snippet: The San Francisco Herald has been favored with the following letter, written by a gentleman connected with Captain STONE'S Surveying Party: GUAYMAS, Oct. 18, 1858, I write with pleasure from this place to give you a few items of news concerning our...

headline.main: SONORA.; Captain Stone's Operations--Condition of Affairs in Sonora--Guano Islands.

docs.lead_paragraph: The San Francisco Herald has been favored with the following letter, written by a gentleman connected with Captain STONE'S Surveying Party: GUAYMAS, Oct. 18, 1858, I write with pleasure from this place to give you a few items of news concerning our survey. We have now been seven months in and about Guaymas, and are all in excellent health and spirits.

docs.snippet: I can send you but little of interest by this mail. Our negro population have been celebrating the Christmas and New-Year's Holidays in their rough manner, by fandangoes, cock-fighting, foot-races, Church-feasts, and by soaking themselves in...

headline.main: THE ISTHMUS.; Particulars and Details of Isthmus News--Retirement of Flag-officer McIntosh--Interchange of Complimentary Letters.

docs.lead_paragraph: I can send you but little of interest by this mail. Our negro population have been celebrating the Christmas and New-Year's Holidays in their rough manner, by fandangoes, cock-fighting, foot-races, Church-feasts, and by soaking themselves in aguadiente, while the whites hare been principally engaged in keeping out of the sun and imbibing iced cobblers.

docs.snippet: We have another snow-storm and the cold is still intense. Heating the hotels by steam is a proven humbug, and in their rooms they rejoice who have large grates or air-tight wood-consuming stoves. A more pinched up, blue-nosed, frozen-eared...

headline.main: AFFAIRS AT ALBANY.; Staten Islander Offenders Against the Health Laws--Claim Bills and their Chances--Raking up Old Scores--Lieutenant Governors to be Looked After--Committees of the Senate and Assembly-New-York and Brooklyn Matters--Jolly Weather.

docs.lead_paragraph: We have another snow-storm and the cold is still intense. Heating the hotels by steam is a proven humbug, and in their rooms they rejoice who have large grates or air-tight wood-consuming stoves. A more pinched up, blue-nosed, frozen-eared congregation I never saw gathered than came up from the Southern Counties by the Hudson and Harlem Railroads yesterday.

docs.snippet: Two great causes of disease in New-York have been overlooked. One-the most manageable and easily enough controlled when honest intelligence heads the departments--is the thick layer of miasmatic matter than overlies all the paved part of the town....

headline.main: Unnoticed Causes of Disease, Two great causes of disease in New-York have been overlooked. One-the most manageable and easily enough controlled when honest intelligence heads the departments--is the thick layer of miasmatic matter that overlies all the paved part of the town.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two great causes of disease in New-York have been overlooked. One-the most manageable and easily enough controlled when honest intelligence heads the departments--is the thick layer of miasmatic matter than overlies all the paved part of the town. The acknowledged source of remittent and intermittent fevers is the decay of vegetable and animal matter in moist situations.

headline.main: ARRIVAL FO THE MOSES TAYLOR; RETURN OF FLAG-OFFICER McINTOSH,, Blockade of Guayaquil--The Ecuadorian War, &c. $1,384,664 IN TREASURE. INTERESTING SOUTH AMERICAN NEWS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamship, Moses Taylor, A. G. GRAY, commanding, from Aspinwall on the 3d inst., arrived at this port about 12 o'clock last night, with the mails, treasure and passengers brought down from San Francisco to Panama by the P. M. Steamship Company's steamer, John L. Stephens, which left San Francisco on the 20th ult.

headline.main: THE WESTERN WORLD.; From the Cincinnati Commercial. Experiences of a California Emigrant--Severe Fight with the Indians.

docs.snippet: A correspondent of the Marion Commonwealth noticing the Africans that passed through Montgomery, Ala., recently, says: "I was carried through 'BROWN'S speculator house,' (so called,) on Perry-Street. In a house in the back lot were huddled together...
docs.lead_paragraph: A correspondent of the Marion Commonwealth noticing the Africans that passed through Montgomery, Ala., recently, says: "I was carried through 'BROWN'S speculator house,' (so called,) on Perry-Street. In a house in the back lot were huddled together thirty-eight native (Congo) Africans! Don't shudder and say 'The moral sentiments of Chris endom condemn the traffic.'
